Survey.Title: Provide Consent
Survey.Text: This document is several pages, but take your time. Your progress will be automatically saved so you can come back to it later.

Survey.Title: Tell us where you’ve been treated
Survey.Text: We ask where patients have been treated, so that we can request medical records, and if applicable, archived tumor tissue.

Survey.Title: Respond to simple surveys
Survey.Text: In these surveys, we ask questions about your experience with brain cancer, like your brain tumor type, when you were diagnosed, and the types of treatments you’ve had.

Survey.Title: Provide a saliva and/or blood sample
Survey.Text: We will send you a kit to collect a sample of your saliva and/or blood. We will compare the normal DNA in your saliva or blood to your tumor DNA.
